description: BR-32 is the District Transport Office for Madhubani, Bihar, located in the heart of the Mithila region. This office manages vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permits for the entire district, which is strategically positioned along the international border with Nepal. It facilitates regional connectivity and logistics for major sub-divisions like Jainagar and Jhanjharpur.
address: District Transport Office, Bhoop Narayan Singh Colony, Collectorate Building, Madhubani, Bihar
